website_summaries.verdict: A good buy if you're looking for a blender with accessories. Features a 1HP motor.
pros: Comes with 2 travel cups and a blender attachment
Easy to clean thanks to dishwasher safe components
Large capacity 56-ounce design is great for serving groups
cons: Container lids are hard to unscrew once attached

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing i make protein shakes everyday and the two cups that come with it are very small also when i put the cover on them they will not come off no matter what i do to get them off. I have tried soaking them in hot water,putting them in the freezer ,even my two sons have tried with no luck also it sounds like a plane taking off way to loud. I will never buy a cuisinart product agin not worth spending extra money for in my opinion a cheap product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOW QUALITY - RETURNED  /  DO NOT BUY! NOT WORTH IT
customer_reviews.text: This was low quality, small & not powerful. To make matters worse, it's been over 10 days since I returned and still NO REFUND. WARNING - DO NOT BUY! NOT WORTH IT.
customer_reviews.author: CCDAY

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with other similar Cuisinart items. Too big and too small
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thinking that it would be the same size blending‘s accessories as the Cuisinart that I already have that is similar to this. And it is not. And the cups and blending item are too big to fit in the dishwasher The food processor portion is smaller than the Cuisinart items I already have so they’re not compatible either. I just took it out too late to send it back so now I’m stuck with this. If you don’t mind it being too big and then go ahead and order this or too small for the food processor portion but it will not be compatible with any Cuisinart items you may already have.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this blender without the protection plan!
customer_reviews.text: This Blender did not last a year!! The piece that turns the blender is cheap!! and will strip over time. I will attempt to contact the manufacturer to see if they will stand by their product. After returning my last blender to Tarjay. I took a chance on this Blender. It's a great solid blender! Only take aways are that the to go containers need a grip and the food processor feels like it could break easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The perfect addition/replacements to my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I have fibromyalgia and carpal tunnel so this saves my hands a TON when needing things shredded/sliced. I also love having smoothies. This cut down my use of storage due to having several utensils in my kitchen to just having this one set. Highly recommend. Also cuts down my time in the kitchen when meal prepping. Love this
customer_reviews.author: Natashia Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Glad I Bought This
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I got it yesterday. I used it this morning to me a coffee smoothie this morning. It definitely does what it needs to do. It was way easy to set up and use. My only gripe is the hard to use shake on the go cups it came with. That took forever to unlodge once it was stuck. I’ll be making smoothies and margaritas much more often.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Great for making smoothies
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it for making smoothies. We bought another brand that was more expensive and returned it. She is much happier with the Cuisinart and its performance.
customer_reviews.author: David Root

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe, Violent Vibrations, Ear Piercingly Loud !AVOID!
customer_reviews.text: Completely disappointed, and highly suspicious that this authentic. Very cheaply manufacturered. Plastics all around are hollow and can't withstand the torque of the motor. Deformed upon fist use. Motor is over powered for the weight and construction of the unit. Unit vibrates and shimmies if not held in place. Cannot leave it unattended while in use. Extremely loud and left my ears ringing. Operator advised to use ear protection while in use. This thing feels unsafe and should be recalled. I would be terrified to use the food processor. Stay away from this thing
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Living the dream
customer_reviews.text: YES! I use this everyday. The smoothies are great! Love the pre-programed buttons & the to-go cups. This thing has a ton of power. The shaved ice is luxurious! Fantastic for cocktails OR a quick italian style shaved ice 'desert'. The blender blades in the lid make it really easy to keep clean. Food processor works great as well and the size gives you room to get in there with a spatula. I'm very impressed with the functionality.
customer_reviews.author: shershey

customer_reviews.title: The food processor is nice and does as it should
customer_reviews.text: The food processor is nice and does as it should, but is significantly smaller than regular food processor. Good for smaller families and great for single. Crushes ice completely or as much as you like. Power shakes are easy and take seconds to make.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Whitley

customer_reviews.title: For the price worth the try
customer_reviews.text: I've only used the to go cups and the smoothie option. The the power and ease of use exceeded my expectation. I've only had it for a couple of weeks and hope that I will feel the same in a couple of years. For the price it practically getting each appliance for $25. Better than any other deal out there.
customer_reviews.author: Smuimgia

customer_reviews.title: Good For Nothing
customer_reviews.text: I bought two. One is still going strong. One fell apartment when I turned it on. When I called Customer Service at Cuisinart they want me to send it back at my expense so hung up, tossed the blender in the recycling bin in my building and forgot about it. Translates into I bought one for the price of two. Nice, huh?
customer_reviews.author: Franco

customer_reviews.title: Much better than any blender I have had before
customer_reviews.text: Blends to a smooth consistency, even strawberries and pineapples etc. Powerful , sturdy and relatively low noise. Looks well made. I am very pleased with it and the additional drinking cups.
customer_reviews.author: Vic S.

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the third of these I have tried. The plastic parts do not fit tightly and they leak. Then when you want to try to change parts, they get stuck. No quality control.
customer_reviews.author: C. Fred

customer_reviews.title: Great combo
customer_reviews.text: I was fortunate to purchase this at a great price. It is not available in stores. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: laurie

customer_reviews.title: The motor is not very strong
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this thinking I could make nut butter, but that’s a joke. I got half way in grinding almonds and the motor just quit on me. And the bottom piece got stuck on the motor. So don’t buy this if your going to be using more than a few times a week.
customer_reviews.author: McKenzie Beltrone

customer_reviews.title: The cheap Chinese product stopped working after 2 months.
customer_reviews.text: The company would only repair it at my shipping expense, this cheap Chinese production of a usual hight rated company. You can't trust any company for quality products.
customer_reviews.author: charles mayeux

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality materials
customer_reviews.text: First looked fine but after using only few months the bottom rolling motor broke. It was so fine and gentle make that could not stand few months of very light use. I am very sad that I went for this low quality material although its pricey but very low quality. joint materials. Now the motor is working but the joint is free and I bit I cant fix it. I shall go and buy another one. Such a stupid waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: hamid

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: So far I’ve only used once and it worked really well. Great quality and good price
customer_reviews.author: Gigi10473

customer_reviews.title: Nice Combo blender/food processor
customer_reviews.text: Works great. We use it mostly for smoothies. Takes a good while to pulverize blackberry seeds and also it would be really nice if the smoothie cups had lids that completely sealed instead of just with a hole to drink out of, but overall very useful. Good having the food processor combo, not many of those out there any more that work very well.
customer_reviews.author: Dave P Glisson

customer_reviews.title: Metal blades broke during normal use within 4 months. ...
customer_reviews.text: Metal blades broke during normal use within 4 months. Have to contact manufacturer to attempt to secure replacement parts. Not well-made.
customer_reviews.author: abigail auer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this unit very happy with my purchase from smoothies to cauliflower mash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Christmas  gift.
customer_reviews.text: It was a great price for a Christmas gift. I have one similar to this one. It's been great for many years.
customer_reviews.author: sarah robinson

customer_reviews.title: Blade rusted out
customer_reviews.text: The blade rusted out within a year of purchase. I did use it every day for protein shakes and soak blade. Don't soak blade if you purchase this item. Sent message on the website. No response.
customer_reviews.author: Christina L Shanks

customer_reviews.title: A nice product
customer_reviews.text: Very good. I like it very much The capacity is full of horsepower
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Blends like a dream. Smoothies are so easy to make. Food processor is a dream!
customer_reviews.author: christopher gerdes

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Works ok, but i had to send the base in for repair after a month of daily use. The assembly stopped turning the blade and it had had to be shipped to the manufacturer. The travel cups would be more efficient if there was a way to close the drinking hole, not easy to travel without spill. The food processor attachment work great.
customer_reviews.author: latoya g.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: food slicer dose not work to much money bought oster instead half price only 60 dollars
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'd have like a glass blender
customer_reviews.text: I'd have like a glass blender. My last small cuisinart had a glass blender. But this one is ok.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: I love my new blender/food processor
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to clean. It had all parts and pieces. I made a smoothie first. It was actually quieter than a previous similar model in a different brand. It blended quickly and very well. I will be making green sauce and other spicy salsas this weekend with it. The blade for the blender unscrews and attaches to the smoothie cups. No hidden spots when grossness gets stuck. I had to buy Cusinart again after having a great response from them when I needed to return another product.(my multi cooker)
customer_reviews.author: OneNuttyMama

customer_reviews.title: Do not spend money on this
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with this blender. Everything, absolutely everything is made of plastic. I think that the liqueur jar should be made of glass or at least you warn in the descriptions of the product that this piece is made of plastic, in this way I could decide if I buy it or not to take away unpleasant surprises, I feel that you stole from me I live in another country and for that reason I can not return this plastic crap. I want my money back.
customer_reviews.author: joaquin salcedo

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: lExcellent product. My previous Cuisinart Blender had a glass top. I was surprised when this came in that it came with a plastic top container. But works great. What's odd about it is that the ring that secures the blades it's backwards, so you turn the other direction to tighten, and counterclockwise to loosen it. Weird. The extra "tumblers" come very handy.
customer_reviews.author: Anushki

customer_reviews.title: Nice machine, but Left hand threads-uh, no.
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, easy to use and plenty of power. And i like those individual milk shake cups.. But, hate those left hand threads when you go to unthread the blade part of the blender. You can't get it off and by the time you realize it's left hand threads, you have it so tight that you REALLY can't get it off. People just aren't used to left hand threads. No good engineering reason not to have conventional right hand threads like Cuisinart used to have.
customer_reviews.author: Dave S

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: *Food processor won't make nut butter. Just pushes the cashews around. *Blender leaks every time. No matter how tight the bottom is, it leaks! 👎 *Tried to shred cheese. The blade stopped turning as soon as the cheese touched it. Awful. I wish I had returned it
customer_reviews.author: pat degraw

customer_reviews.title: Small, 2 cup processor
customer_reviews.text: I like the small volumn processor.I replaced a larger one that was always too big & small attatchment cumbersome. I use the smoothie attachment to make salad dressings. I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Lynn

customer_reviews.title: only at strong as it's weakest link
customer_reviews.text: this is a very lightweight flimsy version of a food processor. lots of plastic not much else. I used it once and the blade stopped spinning.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Stinkmetal

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 10 months.
customer_reviews.text: Loved it for first 10 months, then the cheap black plastic motor hub stripped off the top of the motor shaft. I don't use this very often and the previous model I had lasted 10 years. I thought this part would be a fail point and I was right.
customer_reviews.author: M. Schlenker

customer_reviews.title: LOVED IT SO MUCH I HAD TO GET ANOTHER
customer_reviews.text: RUINED MY FIRST ONE..LOVED IT SO MUCH I HAD TO GET ANOTHER..SUPER VERSATILE..EASY TO USE...FAVORITE APPLIANCE
customer_reviews.author: Janelle Allen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great! Cheaper, more complete,higher quality and easier than Costco equivalent
customer_reviews.author: kodan

customer_reviews.title: it works great - makes super smoothies
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used this very much but will when school is out for the summer. So far though, it works great - makes super smoothies!
customer_reviews.author: Nikpips

customer_reviews.title: VERY disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I am SO disappointed in this Cuisinart, which is not my first...but may be my last. After no more than a dozen times of use the motor just stopped working! Lights were on but only clicking when I pushed any button. I only used it for making smoothies so it wasn't that I was overtaxing it. The other disappointment was the blender jar is plastic; not glass like my previous Cuisinart. I rarely write reviews but for this price I believe all should know....you may want to consider spending your dollars elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah P.

customer_reviews.title: Hope it lasts as long as my last Cuisinart.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it enough to have much of an opinion yet.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

product_meta.title: Cuisinart BFP-650GM Velocity Ultra Trio 1 HP Blender/Food Processor with Travel Cups, Gun Metal
product_meta.description: Color:GunmetalCuisinart introduces the VELOCITY Ultra trio blender/food Processor with travel Cups - a dynamic threesome that lets you do it all! the blender's smart power and sophisticated electronics minces delicate herbs, whips up smoothies, even chops ice. Blend right in the two travel Cups, put on the lids, and enjoy healthy drinks to go. Attach the food Processor work bowl to slice, shred, chop or mix up a dip. With its sturdy base, this 3-in-1 workhorse can handle anything you toss at it - or into it!
feature_bullets: High-performance 1 horsepower motor. Cord length : 36 Inches

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars155 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
